unnormalised: Organic farming is awesome! My grandfather, Kishan kaka, used to do it in his field near Pune.
normalised: Organic farming is awesome! My grandfather, Kishan kaka, used to do it in his field near Pune.

unnormalised: No chemicals, just gobar and hard work, like in that *Mother India* film!
normalised: No chemicals, just gobar and hard work, like in that asterisk Mother India asterisk film!

unnormalised: He supplied veggies to our entire mohalla.
normalised: He supplied veggies to our entire mohalla.

unnormalised: Even the IARI scientists are pushing organic methods, right?
normalised: Even the I A R I scientists are pushing organic methods, right?

unnormalised: Good for the soil, good for our health.
normalised: Good for the soil, good for our health.

unnormalised: Plus, less expensive in the long run, I think.
normalised: Plus, less expensive in the long run, I think.
